query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_KEY, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'g8bsF67YVgm3xfbsaaDV9x' AND TABLE_NAME = 'subscription' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ygUAfurMsr4XGZ.ca3efd02a97c --database g8bsF67YVgm3xfbsaaDV9x --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_KEY, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'g8bsF67YVgm3xfbsaaDV9x' AND TABLE_NAME = 'subscription' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
